contents:
940 President of Poland, Karol Nawrock: “In Poland, we don’t build migrant integration centres. We build deportation centers for those who threaten our nation.” 🔥🔥 🖕   FUCK  CHINA   🖕 posted 6 days ago by basedboston 14 comments award share report block Based Hungary 🇭🇺 @HungaryBased • 8d 🚨 SHOCKING: 🇵🇱 Polish President Karol Nawrocki EXCLUDES Poland from the EU Migration Pact: “In Poland, we don’t build migrant integration centres. We build deportation centres for those who threaten our nation."

Turns out we are.
